mapper.insert: insert into profile (profileNm, backNo, birthDate, state, createDt, updateDt, userNo, profileCategoryNo) VALUES (#{profileNm}, #{backNo}, #{birthDate}, 1, now(), now(), #{userNo}, #{profileCategoryNo})
mapper.select: select profileNo, profileNm, backNo, birthDate, state, createDt, updateDt, userNo, profileCategoryNo from profile where state = true
